title: Aurea Mellis â€” Liquid Gold From the Wild Hive
description: A dark luxury landing page for Aurea Mellis, a fictional single-origin raw honey atelier based in Provence. Deep amber and charcoal palette with gold accents. Features parallax hero, hive-to-jar process timeline, terroir-focused collection grid with 4 European reserves, and private allocation form. Enzyme-pure craft philosophy at the core.
